title: Is Roxy Jacenko the poo jogger? Shock Paddington Pooper theory emerges
text:
The hunt for Roxy Jacenko's female poo jogger is entering its fifth day, with the celebrity publicist no closer to finding the culprit.

But in a bizarre twist, the Sweaty Betty PR founder has been forced to deny that she is the mystery blonde who was caught on CCTV defecating outside her Paddington office earlier this week.

As rumours swirl that she staged the whole scenario as a publicity stunt, Roxy told News.com.au: 'I mean, if that's the case I really am the "PR queen"!'

Poo jogger: In a bizarre twist, Roxy Jacenko has been forced to deny that she is the mystery blonde who was caught on CCTV defecating outside her Paddington office earlier this week

The 'Paddington Pooper' saga began on Monday, when Roxy shared footage to Instagram of an unidentified woman relieving herself outside her Sweaty Beatty PR headquarters on Watson Street, Sydney.

The story quickly went viral across the globe as an outraged Roxy revealed she had caught the jogger engaging in public defecation on two separate occasions.

But on Tuesday, Roxy made the surprising decision to remove the CCTV footage after her social media followers began falsely accusing radio personality Jackie 'O' Henderson of being the woman in the video.

Another suspect? Earlier this week, radio personality Jackie 'O' Henderson was forced to deny that she was the mystery poo jogger

She was outraged that Jackie, who is a longtime friend, was being implicated in the scandal and so deleted the video in order to remove the defamatory comments.

Over the past few days, some individuals have suggested on Twitter that Roxy is the poo jogger, despite the fact the woman in the video is much taller than the publicist.

One person tweeted: 'Publicity stunt. Everything seems to happen at the front of her office. First it was the graffiti vandals, then a stolen pot plant and now a poo jogger.'

This comment referred to a vandalism incident in April in which someone sprayed graffiti outside Roxy's office, and a separate incident two months later when Roxy confronted a man who had allegedly stolen a pot plant from her building.

Scandalous! Over the past few days, some individuals have suggested on Twitter that Roxy is the 'Paddington Pooper'. Daily Mail Australia is not suggesting that Roxy is the poo jogger

Brazen act of indecency: The 'Paddington Pooper' saga began on Monday, when Roxy shared footage to Instagram (above) of an unidentified woman relieving herself outside her Sweaty Beatty PR office on Watson Street, Sydney

Another conspiracy theorist tweeted: 'Wait... is the notorious poo jogger in Sydney actually @roxyjacenko?'

Daily Mail Australia is not suggesting that Roxy Jacenko is the poo jogger.

On Tuesday, Roxy confirmed that police were investigating the matter, saying: 'We have been sent info which will be passed to the police.'

The identity of the 'Paddington Pooper' is currently unknown.
description: The hunt for Roxy Jacenko's female poo jogger is entering its fifth day, with the celebrity publicist no closer to finding the culprit.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
